header.tagline: Senior Estimator – Expert in Large-scale Construction Projects

summary: Accomplished estimator with expertise in civil projects, excelling in cost estimation and project management, delivering $130M+ in project value.

bullets.text: Led comprehensive analysis of tendering documents, applying first principle estimating to achieve optimal project planning.
Spearheaded the preparation of Bill of Quantities (BOQ) and detailed tender documents, ensuring thorough material quantity take-offs.
Engineered cost-effective solutions for civil projects, including structural and MEP installations, enhancing project delivery efficacy.
Managed in-depth cost estimating processes, frequently consulting with a network of reliable suppliers to optimize financial planning.
Conducted detailed project analysis to routinely adjust budget parameters, enhancing financial oversight and project feasibility.
Supervised documentation for residential building projects approvals, maintaining compliance with national construction norms (NBR).
Executed quantity take-off for diverse infrastructure projects, balancing cost and quality.
Conducted rigorous tender analyses and estimated preliminary budgets, facilitating informed decision-making for high-value projects.
Crafted comprehensive Bill of Quantities, detailed costings, and precise project scopes for large-scale civil infrastructure endeavors.
Developed submission documents that set clear expectations on project deliverables and exclusions, enhancing client transparency.
Executed detailed quantity take-offs, validating the accuracy of all civil and structural work specifications.
Contributed to the successful completion of multi-million dollar infrastructure projects, including the South Morang Terminal Station.
Analyzed projects at the tender stage, producing accurate Bill of Quantities and tender proposals for commercial ventures.
Managed detailed BOQ preparation, meeting client expectations for cost management and compliance.
Resolved client disputes through effective cost management strategies, ensuring project integrity.
Executed accurate quantity take-offs and cost evaluations for high-rise residential and commercial buildings.
Produced cost-effective feasibility studies, providing clarity and direction for land acquisition decisions.
Prepared comprehensive feasibility cost studies for logistic warehousing projects, driven by strategic budget planning.
Facilitated the development of cost estimation frameworks, optimizing the preliminary design budgeting process.
Conducted precision-based assessments on design variations and budgeting for large hospital projects.
Managed cost consultancy tasks, enhancing project financial frameworks and operational efficiencies.

education.additionalInfo: Specialized in project management and building cost assessment.
Emphasis on sustainable architectural design and urban development.

additionalExperience: Member of the Brazilian Council of Architecture and Urbanism and AIQS as of December 2023. Engaged in ongoing professional development through specialized courses in construction management and advanced usage of Autodesk tools.
